last_episode_to_air.name: Sholay
last_episode_to_air.overview: Showdown. The country is under an imminent attack and time is running out. Finally, Himmat comes face to face with his nemesis.

name: Special OPS
overview: The series follows Himmat Singh of Research and Analysis Wing who draws similar patterns in terrorist attacks and is convinced a single person is behind all the attacks. His task force team of five agents living in various parts of the world aim to catch the mastermind. The story is based on an inspiration taken from nineteen years worth of national significant events.
